ygData.subject: Re: days played
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know if I d wanna go in Plane of Fear, heard it was VERY hard.  I was told one day a group a lvl 50s went in and within 10 mins they came running out.
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know if I'd wanna go in Plane of Fear, heard it was VERY hard. I
was told one day a group a lvl 50s went in and within 10 mins they came
running out. As for how many days I've played I have no idea I don't keep
up with that I just play to play and nothing more.
Congrats on your Lvl 46.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> hehe...i hit 46 last night, <and wouldn't you know i joined a group for
fear
> right after that, and it broke up...didn't even get to go to the portal ):
>
> and the last time i checked my played, it was something like 49
days.....boy am
> i way behind....of course, there is that factor that i die
alot......hmmm.....o
> wel, in any case, i believe that's a very good accomplishment getting to
20
> that fast...i can't remember how many total hours it took me....
>
> (\/)ystix Spellchaser
> lv 46 human cleric of The Rathe
>
> Mike Schlagenhauf wrote:
>
> > From: "Mike Schlagenhauf" <trelane@...>
> >
> > Last nite I just hit 19, and just at 6 days played. Not to mention I've
> > spent a good 6 hours minimum in auctioning off things and buying things.
> > With that 6 hours, I'd probably be halfway to 20. :)
> >
> > -- Lohre
> > Ambassador of Lifeforce Brigade
> > Bristlebane Server

to

time

> > > story..
> > > he WAS 16) and made that in under 6 game days. A good deal of that was
> > spent
> > > dying and wandering. If I concentrate on him he should hit 20 in 10
game
> > > days
> > > easily and I would hardly consider myself experienced. I would bet a
> > > twinked,
> > > power leveled character can hit 20 in 5 days or less. I have a friend
who
> > > hit
> > > 20 in 6 days with his Barbarian Warrior.
